features_cards.title: AI Recipe Generation
features_cards.description: Get personalized recipes based on your dietary restrictions, preferences, and calorie goals

features_cards.title: Meal Planning
features_cards.description: Plan your meals in advance with our intelligent scheduling system that considers your lifestyle

features_cards.title: Diabetes-Safe
features_cards.description: All recipes are carefully crafted to support healthy blood sugar levels and diabetes management

features_cards.title: Dietary Restrictions
features_cards.description: Support for vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and other dietary needs without compromising taste

features_cards.title: Smart Nutrition
features_cards.description: Automatic calorie counting and nutritional analysis to keep you on track with your health goals

features_cards.title: Health Tracking
features_cards.description: Monitor your progress and see how your dietary choices impact your overall health and wellbeing
